DomainDisplayName: The display name of this domain (used in error message when attempting to reference content incorrectly)
ErrorMessageIfUsedElsewhere: The error message if something that is not allowed to attempts to reference content from this domain
ContentRoots: The list of content root paths considered to be part of this domain
SpecificAssets: A list of specific assets considered to be part of this domain
ReferenceMode: What content is this domain allowed to access?
CanReferenceTheseDomains:
The list of additional domains always visible from this domain
(EngineContent is always visible)
